thread.title: A Behind-the-Scenes look at ABC’s ‘The View’ Walt Disney World Resort News
thread.title_full: A Behind-the-Scenes look at ABC’s ‘The View’ Walt Disney World Resort News

author: mkilwein
title: A Behind-the-Scenes look at ABC’s ‘The View’ Walt Disney World Resort News
text:
Yesterday, The View announced the exciting news that as part of their 20th season celebration, the co-hosts of “ The View ,” Whoopi Goldberg, Joy Behar, Sara Haines, Jedediah Bila, Sunny Hostin and Paula Faris, are coming to Walt Disney World Resort in March to broadcast episodes from Disney’s Animal Kingdom .
A lot of fun happened behind the scenes to create this magical moment. Watch the video below to see the fun the hosts had with some very exciting special guests to make this announcement happen.
